name: Tape Breakers
description:
Note: This game was made without a game engine in java with no extra frameworks and from scratch.

In this game, Tape breaks the rules of being a role of tape! 

This game was made for the "Mini Jam Game #16"

How To Play:

- You break as much boards as you can in 30 seconds! You can also try and beat your highscore!

Controls: 

- Movement: Tape (The Character) follows your mouse in the window

- Breaking Boards: When Tape is behind a board, the board breaks

Other:

- Why is the windows version not an exe? I didn't have enough time to convert it and code sign it

- Sorry if the screenshots are low resolution 

- Here is a video if you are having trouble opening the windows version: 

Requirements:

- Windows: Latest version of java, you can download it from Oracle (At least Java 19)

- Mac: If you don't have the latest version of java you can update java and run the game or run the version WithJRE
